hasDrawer.description: Flag indicating the wizard has a drawer for at least one of the wizard steps

hasNoBodyPadding.description: Set to true to remove body padding

isDrawerExpanded.description: Flag indicating the wizard drawer is expanded

mainAriaLabel.description:
Adds an accessible name to the wizard body when the body content overflows and renders
a scrollbar.

mainAriaLabelledBy.description:
Adds an accessible name to the wizard body by passing the the id of one or more elements.
The aria-labelledby will only be applied when the body content overflows and renders a scrollbar.

nav.description: Function that returns the WizardNav component (Function: (isWizardNavOpen: boolean) => React.ReactElement<any>)

onExpandDrawer.description: Callback function for when the drawer is toggled (Function: () => void)

onNavToggle.description: Callback function for when the nav is toggled (Function: (isOpen: boolean) => void)
